full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SH'AKYA BTZUN PA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYIS DAG RNAMS PHYOGS SU STEBS PA LA YE SHES MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA LA BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL SDUS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES DPAL MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA LA BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL MDOR BSDUS 'DI NI, DAD PA DANG LDAN PA'I SLOB DPON DGE TSUL BLO BZANG DKON MCHOG NGAG DBANG DAR RGYAS @003B BLO BZANG SBYIN PA SOGS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, CHOS SMRA BA BTZUN PA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS BRGYAN GYIS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE'I DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,)
